name: Descent (Udayan Senapati (CurryIs2Hot4U), amanm, Ethan Smith)
description:
You are a convict in a supermax prison in the sky. One day, the prison systems appear to malfunction and release all prisoners. You see your chance to finally escape and take it. Escape the prison and avoid getting shot by the guards!

Controls:

WASD - normal movement

Shift - sprint

cntrl - crouch/slide(while moving)

Right Click - Aim Gun

Left Click - Shoot Gun

 when in the air, press F to glide!

Glide Controls:

W - Down

S - Level out

A - turn left

D - turn right

The game also supports controller input!

Members:

Udayan Senapati

Aman Mathur

Ethan Smith
